bug.short_desc: arm-none-eabi-gcc can't locate crti.o and crtbegin.o
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: Error compiling md380-tools (https://github.com/travisgoodspeed/md380tools).
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): 6.2.0-1
How reproducible: git clone https://github.com/travisgoodspeed/md380tools cd md380tools make
Actual results: /usr/lib/gcc/arm-none-eabi/6.2.0/../../../../arm-none-eabi/bin/ld: cannot find crti.o: No such file or directory /usr/lib/gcc/arm-none-eabi/6.2.0/../../../../arm-none-eabi/bin/ld: cannot find crtbegin.o: No such file or directory /usr/lib/gcc/arm-none-eabi/6.2.0/../../../../arm-none-eabi/bin/ld: cannot find -lgcc collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
Expected results: Should produce applet.elf
Additional info:

I've just tried that and your reproducer and it worked for me.
> Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): > 6.2.0-1
do you really have this version? It is just a bootstrapping version (incomplete) and should not be in the repository. There should be 6.2.0-2

(In reply to Michal Hlavinka from comment #1) > I've just tried that and your reproducer and it worked for me. > > > > Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): > > 6.2.0-1 > > do you really have this version? It is just a bootstrapping version > (incomplete) and should not be in the repository. There should be 6.2.0-2
I must have caught the repo at the wrong time. I now have the -2 release, not -1.
The problem has been solved outside of this bug.
